subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Islanders had a 2-0 lead and held the Blue Jackets to 12 shots through two periods, but Columbus rallied to win, 3-2, in a shootout.
snippet: The Islanders had a 2-0 lead and held the Blue Jackets to 12 shots through two periods, but Columbus rallied to win, 3-2, in a shootout.
